On Mon, 2004-05-03 at 17:37, Andrew Boyko wrote:
> I've successfully used a patched version of
> dk.netarkivet.ArcTools.ExtractCDX 
> to generate Wayback-compliant CDX files from an Alexa-style DAT file. 
> My
> patch is attached, should it be useful to anyone.
>  

Using a Map instead of a Hashtable is the right thing, but I don't want
to have DAT-extracts[1] automatically conform to Wayback format.  If it
was an option flag or a separate method, I'd apply the patch.

-Lars

[1] Curiously, I also work with DAT on another project, only there it's
DAT tapes.  They suck.
